1.title: Hair: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver
1.subtitle: John Oliver discusses the importance of Black hair, the ways it can be a target of discrimination, and some ideas to address that.

1.title: Savor Seasoning Blends
1.subtitle: Savor Seasonings blends are handcrafted creations by the Spencer family; Dulani, Lisa and Myles.

products.name: Rubbed: Honey, It's BBQ
products.description: A honey based rub for your ribs, ham salmon. The honey base will give your meats a nice crispy, caramel crust.

products.name: Truffle Butter
products.description: Sweet cream butter, blended with Italian black truffles and truffle salt. Your potatoes, beef, pork, veggies, sourdough bread, pasta, seafood, rice and your tummy will thank you!

products.name: Vampire Salt (6oz Grinder)
products.description: A blend of garlic cloves and sea salt. It's just that simple. Try it on everything; soups, sauces, poultry, pork, beef, mashed potatoes, veggies.

2.title: How to deconstruct racism, one headline at a time
2.subtitle: Baratunde Thurston explores the phenomenon of white Americans calling the police on black Americans who have committed the crimes of ... eating, walking or generally "living while black." In this profound, thought-provoking and often hilarious talk, he reveals the power of language to change stories of trauma into stories of healing — while challenging us all to level up.

2.title: RayTec Audio
2.subtitle: RayTec, wherever you go, your soundtrack should follow. Music has changed the world. It's a form of expression and should be heard at the highest, premium level. When you hear music that you like, when you're listening to a book of your choosing, you get excited, or motivated or you may become active.

products.name: RayTec Wireless Speaker
products.description: RayTec Audio BT-27 Wireless Speaker

products.name: RayTec Watch6 — Black Case
products.description: Make bluetooth calls through your watch for hands free communication. Read messages and notifications through this watch: Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp and more.

products.name: RayTec-C10 Headphones
products.description: Comfy on the ears, Adjustable to fit on your head, Foldable, Chargeable, Super bass

3.title: Vera Institute of Justice
3.subtitle: Vera is powered by hundreds of advocates, researchers, and activists working to transform the criminal legal and immigration systems until they’re fair for all. Founded in 1961 to advocate for alternatives to money bail in New York City, Vera is now a national organization that partners with impacted communities and government leaders for change.

3.title: Accountability in a Time of Justice
3.subtitle: Accountability is a well-worn word in social justice circles. We have worked hard to figure out what accountability means to us as we attempt to walk our social justice talk.

4.title: Book: The Global Beauty Industry
4.subtitle: Colorism, Racism, and the National Body

4.title: Pod For The Cause Podcast
4.subtitle: The Leadership Conference on Civil and Human Rights launched "Pod for the Cause" to expand the conversation on the critical civil and human rights challenges of our day. Through this expanded dialogue, we want to spur activism that drives change in our communities and country.

5.title: Know Your Rights Camp
5.subtitle: Colin Kaepernick's organization's mission is to advance the liberation and well-being of Black and Brown communities through education, self-empowerment, mass-mobilization and the creation of new systems that elevate the next generation of change leaders.

5.title: Four-year Analysis: Police-related deaths across racial groups
5.subtitle: A four-year research study released on June 24th, 2020 shows that Black Americans were, on average, more than three times as likely as White Americans to be killed during a police encounter.

6.title: Criminal Justice Facts
6.subtitle: The Sentencing Project compiles state-level criminal justice data from a variety of sources. Using this state-by-state data feature, you can navigate between interactive maps, tables, and rankings that allow you to access and use these data.

6.title: I Wear African
6.subtitle: I Wear African is a campaign initiative created to promote and celebrate the contemporary African lifestyle by bringing the best quality Afrocentric brands to our fans.

products.name: Hector Rectangular Indoor Lumbar Pillow
products.description: Artfully inspiring and beautiful, the Lumbar Pillow bolsters your home instantly and effortlessly while evoking bohemian style. Made in the USA, the classic rectangular silhouette of the pillow is filled with a feather down insert and is covered with a quality linen blend fabric.

products.name: African Print Dashiki T-Shirt White
products.description: The D’iyanu white dashiki t-shirt is perfect for those hot summer days! Stay cool and look great with this dashiki t-shirt which features an ultra soft feel and unique center front and sleeve details. This will become an instant favorite in your closet, and one of your most worn shirts in the hot summer!

products.name: Women African Print Yellow Long Puff Sleeve Dress
products.description: Handmade, 100% cotton, Afronista dress. Available in sizes 2-14.

7.title: How studying privilege systems can strengthen compassion
7.subtitle: Her TED Talk offers a shift in the traditional view of race, equity and privilege. McIntosh uses her own experience as a white woman to inform her own knowledge of racial experiences from a white perspective.

7.title: Swimming caps designed for natural hair banned from Tokyo Olympic Games
7.subtitle: Swimming caps designed for natural Black hair — and created by a Black-owned company — will not be allowed at the upcoming Olympic Games in Tokyo. The International Swimming Federation said the caps do not follow "the natural form of the head," British brand Soul Cap told BBC News.

8.title: Gentleman AF
8.subtitle: Gentleman AF is a beard care line featuring a beard wash, beard oils, and beard balms for classy men with a dash of savagery.

products.name: Beard Balms
products.description: Scoop a dime sized amount of beard balm with your finger and place it in the palm of your hands. Rub it between both palms until it melts. Apply it to your beard, comb it down and style as desired.

products.name: Beard Wash
products.description: Wet your face and neck, place a small amount of beard wash in the palm of your hands and massage it into your beard and face, including your neck. Rinse your beard thoroughly.

products.name: Beard Oils
products.description: Shake well before use. Drop a dime sized amount of beard oil in the palm of your hands. Rub your hands and apply the oil from your skin to the tip of your beard.

8.title: Color of Change
8.subtitle: Color Of Change was founded in moments just like this one. As Black communities reeled in grief as all levels of government failed to protect Black people in the wake of Hurricane Katrina, we recognized that not enough of the people and institutions with power over our lives had any fear of disappointing Black people. For the last 15 years, we've focused on building that power.

9.title: Puzzle Huddle
9.subtitle: Kids grow up fast! Stay connected and hear about new puzzle designs and discounts. We promise not to spam you because we're too busy with potty training and coloring books.

products.name: XL Chemistry Girl Kids' Puzzle
products.description: The XL Chemistry Girls' Puzzle was created to inspire and affirm children using a creative format. This puzzle measures 14n x 19.5in, includes 100 pieces, and is constructed from sturdy cardboard similar to most puzzles sold in stores. Depending on a child’s fine motor skills, the puzzle can be ideal toddlers or young children.

products.name: Future President - Oval Office
products.description: The Future President - Oval Office Puzzle measures 12in x 16.5in, includes 54 pieces, and is constructed from sturdy cardboard similar to most puzzles sold in stores. Depending on a child’s development and fine motor skills, this puzzle can be ideal toddlers or young children.

products.name: XL Noah's Ark Kids' Puzzle
products.description: The XL Noah's Ark Kids Puzzle was created to inspire and affirm children using a creative format. This puzzle measures 14in x 19.5in, includes 100 pieces, and is constructed from sturdy cardboard similar to most puzzles sold in stores. Depending on a child’s fine motor skills, the puzzle can be ideal toddlers or young children.

9.title: NinetyNine Products
9.subtitle: Our mission is to deliver functional & beautiful product that celebrate the people who help people. 99% of our marketing dollars will spotlight those individuals we believe do more than their fare share of shaping our communities in positive ways.

10.title: "ABC I Love Me"
10.subtitle: ABC I Love Me takes Black children along for a journey of self love, confidence, and adventure while teaching young learners positive affirmations for each letter of the alphabet. This book encourages children to accept their unique qualities, and promotes positive self-esteem and a healthy lifestyle.

10.title: Be A Good Person
10.subtitle: Instead of supporting the current trends of negativity, our #1 goal is to remind us all to approach our days with an optimistic, positive, and refreshed outlook. We believe that positive change truly starts with within ourselves, one person at a time.

products.name: Black Color Spectrum Shirt
products.description: Fashion fit, soft feel. Water based ink screen print. BAGP hem tag. Straight cut bottom

products.name: Reflective Core Bodysuit
products.description: One Piece bodysuit but versatile enough to be utilized as a swimsuit.

products.name: Cardinal Snapback Hat
products.description: Cardinal Snapback BE A GOOD PERSON Hat

11.title: Shades of My Melanin LLC
11.subtitle: At Shades of My Melanin, our goal is to not only offer products that make you feel beautiful in your own skin but to offer products that tell a story for each and every person who wears them. We offer fun, colorful, and creative products that can be worn by all ages.

11.title: Eb + Flo Boutique
11.subtitle: Eb and Flo started out as just a vision and manifested in 2020. Our CEO, Ebony Hunter, is a strong believer in living out your dreams while not only looking good but feeling good too. Our mission is to provide styles that flow with you from moment to moment, whether you’re making a quick run to the grocery store or meeting the girls for brunch. With comfort and quality in mind, we make looking lavish easy. Look good, feel good.

products.name: Classic Boss Lady Track Suit
products.description: Chic track suit for the lady on the go. Throw it on for a quick trip to the grocery store, a nail appointment, or dress it up for a cute brunch look.

products.name: Tedy Soft Sherpa Jacket
products.description: The warmest and most comfortable jacket you'll ever own! The Teddy Sherpa Jacket feels like a warm hug or like you're wearing a blanket. Features a drawstring hem that allows you to snatch that waist hunny *snap*snap*

products.name: "Thou shall not try me" T-Shirt
products.description: Mood 24:7! Let the folks know the deal in this super soft tee.

12.title: Daunte Wright was stopped for expired plates, but driving while Black may have been his 'crime'
12.subtitle: The police confrontation escalated after officers saw what could have been an air freshener hanging illegally from the rearview mirror.

12.title: Ban or Restrict Tear Gas
12.subtitle: The use of tear gas has been banned and is illegal in war. This same tear gas is used by the law enforcement, to control unarmed crowds protesting for the BLM movement. Tear gas is also used for border control and is thrown at innocent migrants who are unarmed and pose no sudden threat to anyone in the vicinity.

13.title: What it takes to be racially literate
13.subtitle: Over the last year, Priya Vulchi and Winona Guo traveled to all 50 US states, collecting personal stories about race and intersectionality. Now they're on a mission to equip every American with the tools to understand, navigate and improve a world structured by racial division.

13.title: The Bail Project
13.subtitle: The Bail Project™ National Revolving Bail Fund is on a mission to combat mass incarceration and reshape the pretrial system in the United States. 100% of online donations are used to bring people home. Since bail money comes back to us when cases close, we're able to recycle every dollar donated at least twice per year.

14.title: Brown Toy Box
14.subtitle: Our mission is to normalize Black excellence and create prosperous career pathways for Black children through STEAM education, cultural representation and educational play.

14.title: Juneteenth Challenges A Narrative About America’s History
14.subtitle: Juneteenth marks the day in 1865 when Union troops arrived in Galveston, Texas, and the enslaved people living there learned of their freedom — more than two years after President Abraham Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation. As such, the day tells a broader story of how emancipation was woefully delayed for Black people enslaved deep in the Confederacy.

15.title: Kids Swag
15.subtitle: Great action is taking place to improve diversity in books and dolls and there are a number of different vendors making it easier to find these great items. But what about everything else in your child's world? You go grocery shopping, what image is on the cute plate and cup set your child wants? You're want to encourage their creativity, what images are in their colouring books? You're throwing a birthday party, what are your options?
15.moreInfo: The list can go on and on. It is an unnecessarily complicated task to source and purchase everyday lifestyle products for children that have black images. These companies exist but one must be internet savvy and social media literate to find them. KIDS SWAG was launched in December 2016 to make it easy for parents to build environments that are reflective of their child's beauty.

products.name: Nia Ballerina Backpack
products.description: This beautifully illustrated pink rucksack is the perfect accessory for your little ballerina, which is both lightweight and practical with plenty of storage. Made from durable and water-resistant material this rucksack features a colourful design with two images of Nia Ballerina on the front.

products.name: Nana Yaa
products.description: Nana means Queen or King in West Africa , Ghana. The founders of Nana Dolls wanted to teach the younger generation of their history whilst also having fun. There were many strong courageous women from all over Africa who helped to fight for freedom.

products.name: Super Friends Onesie
products.description: Your little Superhero featured as your favourite Superhero.

15.title: Implicit Bias — how it effects us and how we push through
15.subtitle: Everyone makes assumptions about people they don’t know. Melanie Funchess will teach us to recognize these assumptions and work toward a common understanding.

16.title: Taste by Dannie K
16.subtitle: Taste by Dannie K is a black-owned lingerie company dedicated to the empowerment of women of all shades and sizes. It is our mission to help women realize that they are powerful beyond measure & that they don't have to tone down their super power of sexy to be taken seriously.

16.title: Red Bay Coffee
16.subtitle: Red Bay Coffee is at the forefront of what we believe is the fourth wave of coffee—a firm commitment to ensure coffee production is not only high quality and sustainable, but a vehicle for diversity, inclusion, social and economic restoration, entrepreneurship, and environmental sustainability. We are foodies, artists, activists, community folk, and innovators who love, love, love what we do.

products.name: East Fourteenth
products.description: Tanzanian Dark Roast - Blackberry, Dark Chocolate, Date  East Fourteenth is an homage to a past heritage and a link to history in the making. It is the story of Oakland’s wide-reaching cultures and creeds.

products.name: Coffee Mug - Africa's Gift (Black)
products.description: "Coffee Africa's Gift to the World" Coffee Mug - beautiful, stylish, black-on-black design with Red Bay Coffee logo - 12 ounces

products.name: Unisex Sweatshirt - Black Coffee - Black
products.description: Crewneck Sweatshirt - black with black foil print; back Red Bay Coffee logo; 80/20 Poly-Cotton Blend. Locally sourced and screen printed in Oakland, CA.

17.title: Grace X Originals LLC
17.subtitle: Grace X Originals is a "Slow Fashion" Streetwear & Lifestyle Brand. We take our time to expertly hand-dye our textiles and apply high-end airbrush artistry to our designs with sustainable fashion practices foremost in mind.

17.title: Controversy over Confederate monuments is overdue
17.subtitle: As Confederate monuments and memorials are toppled across the United States, Stanford historian James T. Campbell says it is important to think historically not only about the past but also about our own time and what future generations might say about us.

18.title: Marie Hunter Beauty
18.subtitle: Cosmetics and Fragrances for the Modern Muse. Boldly empowering women with beauty, confidence and class since 2016.

products.name: Queen Lipstick
products.description: Intense matte, super-rich formula delivers vibrant color with a velvety texture and long lasting comfort. A nourishing blend of oils and butters condition and soften lips. Advanced humectants deliver powerful hydration to help keep lips moist and supple.

products.name: Desert Sun Lipgloss
products.description: Lip Plumping Peptide Complex Maxi helps to stimulate collagen for a voluptuous look. Marine Filling Collagen Micro-Spheres instantly plump and hydrate. Mango, Kokam & Shea Butter hydrate and condition the lips while Vitamins A, C & E provide antioxidants to help protect lips from free radical damage.

products.name: Daily Hydration Cream
products.description: A daily moisturizer for intense hydration. A lightweight, quick absorbing cream that transforms skin into a supple, healthier looking appearance.

18.title: Build for Black Lives
18.subtitle: Are you an anti-racist designer, developer, data scientist, or marketing specialist interested in committing to pro bono projects to work towards reparations and racial justice? Work on one of our available projects.

19.title: So you want to talk about race
19.subtitle: Ijeoma Oluo guides readers of all races through subjects ranging from intersectionality and affirmative action to "model minorities" in an attempt to make the seemingly impossible possible: honest conversations about race and racism, and how they infect almost every aspect of American life.

19.title: Coily and Cute
19.subtitle: Sharee has loved art all her life and has taken every opportunity to study it. She runs one of the Black-owned companies where customers can buy art prints.

20.title: My Beautiful Fluff

20.title: Daunte's Funeral and future care of Daunte Jr.
20.subtitle: Please donate to give Daunte Wright the proper burial he deserves and to help his son and son's mother Chyna. And if you can't support financially, please send lots of prayers for the family to get through this tragic loss.

21.title: Designs by Tee LLC
21.subtitle: Brooklyn Social Worker designing positive t-shirts and apparel. Supporting homeless children and families in NYC.

21.title: Covid-19’s Impact on People in Prison
21.subtitle: People who are incarcerated are at great risk of sickness and death as a result of the Covid-19 pandemic and more must be done to release people who are imprisoned and are not a threat to public safety or are elderly or infirm.

22.title: Sade Baron
22.subtitle: Sade and Rachel are a mother-daughter duo creating high-performance body care products that make your skin feel great. products.name: Body Care Set 1 - Normal Skin
products.description: The essentials kit features everything you need to keep maintain your skin health. Start with a new skinfood routine and feed it nutrient-rich superfoods all day, every day.

products.name: Go Clean Starter Kit | Body Care Set
products.description: With this Go Clean Body Care Starter Set you can finally remove excessive ingredients and chemicals from your daily body care routine. With Sade Baron, all of our products are 100% vegan, made with clean ingredients to work for most skin types, so you can trust that you'll find great products to work for you.

products.name: Fragrance Free Body Wash
products.description: A light face and body wash suitable for everyday use. This fragrance-free body wash is perfect for babies, children and adults with reactive and sensitive skin. With superfats galore like avocado oil, olive oil and more, this liquid castile soap will leave your skin hydrated day after day.

22.title: Walking While Black
22.subtitle: Garnette Cadogan on the Realities of Being Black in America

23.title: Mutt's Sauce
23.subtitle: In 1956, Mutt got the idea to make a sauce he could use for every meal. Mutt’s sauce was a multi-purpose specialty sauce, infusing sweet, tangy and a little bit of heat into each spoonful.

products.name: Combo 3 Pack
products.description: BEST VALUE! Try all three: Original, Sweet N Spicy, Ghost Pepper

products.name: Deluxe Spices 3 Pack
products.description: It took 7 years to decide on what flavors to introduce in our spice line. These spices are unique because when paired with Mutt's Sauce, you can create three limited edition flavors.

products.name: Deluxe Combo Pack — Sauce + Spices
products.description: This is the ultimate gift for Cooking with Mutt's Sauce!  Try the sauces:  Gluten Free Original, Sweet N Spicy, and Ghost Pepper, as well as our new line of spices: Berbere, Garlic Ghost Pepper, and Onion Pepper.

23.title: Oh-Mazing!
23.subtitle: Yes, we sell granola (it's quite tasty), but more importantly, we want to inspire you to live your life with purpose, passion, and to follow your dreams. Our products are here to bring the adventure back to snacking, and better yet, celebrate YOU when those dreams are achieved.

products.name: Original Recipe
products.description: The Original Recipe blend has a sweet caramel flavor that makes it simply delicious. There are so many ways to enjoy this treat--topping on your yogurt, adding some crunch to your favorite ice cream, or creating a crust for a cheesecake.

products.name: Lemon Bar
products.description: Lemon Bar will please the palate of all lemon lovers and add a refreshing flavor to a bowl of oatmeal or a new bite to your favorite cheesecake recipe.

products.name: Caribbean Delight
products.description: Caribbean Delight is our first vegan product. The ingredients include coconut oil, grated coconut, and a touch of raisins that will make your palate dance. Not to mention, you will immediately be reminded of that time you went on an island vacation.

24.title: Uncivil Podcast
24.subtitle: Uncivil brings you stories that were left out of the official history of the Civil War, ransacks America's past, and takes on the history you grew up with. We bring you untold stories about resistance, covert operations, corruption, mutiny, counterfeiting, antebellum drones, and so much more.

24.title: Oprah Winfrey's Cecil B. DeMille Award Acceptance Speech - 2018 Golden Globe Awards
24.subtitle: Watch Oprah Winfrey's 2018 Golden Globe Awards acceptance speech for the Cecil B. DeMille Award.

25.subtitle: In this thought-provoking documentary, scholars, activists and politicians analyze the criminalization of African Americans and the U.S. prison boom.

26.title: Hoodietowel

26.subtitle: An unforgettable true story about the potential for mercy to redeem us, and a clarion call to end mass incarceration in America — from one of the most inspiring lawyers of our time.

27.title: Spoon & Theory Handmade
27.subtitle: Spoon and Theory handmade is a black-owned creative arts, jewelry and aromatherapy goods store. We provide goods from upcycled leather to Eco-inspired laser cut jewelry + aromatherapy diffuser jewelry + aromatherapy body + home goods.

products.name: Jubilee Ankara Face Mask with Nose Bridge
products.description: Secure, then fasten the double strings around the base of head for comfortable yet snug fit, eliminating irritation behind ears. Minneapolis mask makers, quality face masks.

products.name: Oatmeal and Spice Moisturizing Body Bar
products.description: This soap is great for those with suffer from dry skin. With warm hints of cinnamon and clove, the mild creamy exfoliating lather leaves skin feel smooth, soft and smelling delicious.

27.title: Shoe Crazy Wine
27.subtitle: We work with the best vineyards in California to develop our unique blends. Our wines are created with women in mind. products.name: Naked Strawberry Passion Sangria ( Non-Alcohol)
products.description: Our Hand Crafted , scintillating Sweet Sangria created from superior ingredients with tangy citrus notes and hints of strawberry pie. Pairs with chocolate, ham, bacon wrapped scallops and key lime pie. Enjoy “As Is” or add seltzer, Shoe Crazy's Sparkling Strawberry Rose wine, or your favorite spirits.

products.description: A beautiful orange hue that is accentuated by tiny bubbles. Inviting aromas of succulent peach & sweet mango entwine.

28.title: Me and White Supremacy
28.subtitle: Based on the viral Instagram challenge that captivated participants worldwide, Me and White Supremacy takes readers on a 28-day journey, complete with journal prompts, to do the necessary and vital work that can ultimately lead to improving race relations.

28.title: The Case for Reparations
28.subtitle: Two hundred fifty years of slavery. Ninety years of Jim Crow. Sixty years of separate but equal. Thirty-five years of racist housing policy. Until we reckon with our compounding moral debts, America will never be whole.

29.title: Riot Swim
29.subtitle: Riot Swim is an online designer swimwear and beachwear brand, offering an exclusive collection of bikinis, one piece swimsuits, and more.

29.title: Amanda Gorman Inauguration Poem
29.subtitle: Watch and read the youngest poet laureate, Amanda Gorman, recite her poem "The Hill We Climb"

30.title: Change.org: Justice for Daunte Wright
30.subtitle: 20 year old man Daunte Wright, a father to a two year old, was murdered by Minneapolis-area police. Help get him and his family justice by signing this petition.

30.title: Sweet Pea Books Inc
30.subtitle: Sweet Pea Books is dedicated to producing multicultural books that expose, inspire, amuse, and foster a love of reading in all children. Sweet Pea Books aims to promote the development of good character by teaching values through literature as well as expose young readers to different cultures.

products.name: D Is For Dragon Fruit (Hardcover)
products.description: D is for Dragon Fruit is a vibrantly illustrated, exotic fruit alphabet book that exposes children to a variety of nutritious fruits, reinforces the alphabet and expands a child’s knowledge of the world.

products.name: When Mama Braids My Hair (Hardcover)
products.description: When Mama Braids My Hair captures a young girl’s experience of having her hair braided and the bond it creates with her mother. The tradition of African hair braiding is more than just a Sunday routine. Come join Nikki on an adventure as she is transformed into an Egyptian queen, a Nigerian goddess, a Zulu warrior, and a Maasai girl.

products.name: Elephants Don't Have Stripes! (COMING SOON!)
products.description: Elephants Don’t Have Stripes! Deep in the valley, in the dry grasslands of the African savanna, a young elephant admires other animals for their beauty. He yearns to look and act more like them. One by one, each wish comes true and the young elephant couldn’t be happier.

31.title: The RACE Method Of Talking To A Racism Skeptic
31.subtitle: The RACE Method is an approach that anti-racism allies can take to trying to share their perspective with people who are skeptical that racism against people of color is a problem worthy of specific attention. It is based on principles from non-violent communication and on findings from the science of persuasion.

31.title: Black Lives Matter
31.subtitle: We appreciate your support of the movement and our ongoing fight to end state-sanctioned violence, liberate Black people, and end white supremacy forever.
